1: I choose to embrace positivity and avoid offense.
2: Some will act against you, believing they do good.
3: Love and understanding deepen my connections with others.
4: I share insights now to help you remember later.
5: I journey forward with purpose and direction.
6: I embrace joy and positivity in my life.
7: My departure brings you comfort and support.
8: He brings clarity about goodness, right actions, and fairness.
9: Believing in what is good leads to positive change.
10: I pursue righteousness as I connect with the divine.
11: I embrace the triumph of good over negativity.
12: I share what you can understand, guiding you as you grow.
13: The Spirit of truth guides me to all understanding.
14: I receive and share the goodness I discover.
15: Everything shared with me brings new insights for you.
16: I will see joy and connection again soon.
17: I embrace the joy of connection and anticipation.
18: I embrace the mystery of life's unfolding moments.
19: I embrace the understanding that clarity comes with time.
21: Joy comes with new life after difficult times.
22: I find joy that no one can take from me.
23: I ask with faith, and I receive.
24: When I ask, I receive and my joy is complete.
25: I understand clearly and see the truth about the Father.
26: I ask in confidence, and my requests are heard.
27: I am loved for my faith and trust in love.
28: I embrace my journey from the world to a higher purpose.
29: I communicate clearly and openly to share understanding.
30: I confidently believe that you come from a higher source.
32: I find strength and support in my connection with the Father.
33: I find peace and joy despite challenges.
